name: Prateek Kumar
title: Senior Software Engineer
summary: Senior software engineer focused on React architecture, client and API boundary design, and reliable production delivery for workflow-heavy products.
Builds maintainable systems by replacing tightly coupled implementations with explicit contracts and observable integration paths.
Owns delivery from planning through release, including code review, cross-team coordination, and production support.

highlights: Led React/Redux architecture for responsive web products with reusable component patterns and predictable state flows.
Defined API contracts with backend teams to improve integration clarity and reduce cross-team debugging friction.
Drove profiling-led performance and reliability improvements through targeted refactoring and regression-safe releases.
Owned end-to-end delivery workflow: sprint planning, code reviews, release coordination, and stakeholder reporting.
Built and maintained customer-facing and internal modules using React.js/Redux with mobile-first and cross-browser support.
Delivered full-stack features spanning frontend workflows, backend services, and REST API integration.
Managed deployment and production maintenance on Apache (AWS EC2) with static/media delivery via S3.
Maintained clean, testable code and supported stable releases across multiple product surfaces.

selected_projects.name: Cargo Web
selected_projects.impact: Shifted desktop workflows to an API-driven web platform used in nationwide production, improving observability and operational stability.

selected_projects.name: Platform Consolidation
selected_projects.focus: Unified booking, payments, and mobile delivery architecture
selected_projects.impact: Reduced duplicate implementation and maintenance overhead by centralizing shared product capabilities into one durable platform.

selected_projects.name: AWTAR / KSRTC
selected_projects.impact: Delivered Android and iOS in one week by selecting a pragmatic React Native WebView strategy without extending timeline.

certifications: Certificate for Completion of Python Training
